reviewText:
Excellent DVD
Excellent Film
perfect actors
Stefanie Powers and Robert Wagner are wonderful in Jennifer and Jonathan Hart
Perfect for the fan of Hart to Hart

Hart To Hart: Two Harts In Three-Quarter Time with Robert Wagner, I love this show  i was so happy when amazon had some of their movies. if you liked the show, you will love the movies. hope amazon puts more of their movies out for me to watch.
These movies are almost impossible to find in stores and they brought back some good memories from growing up. They just don't make movies like these anymore

Hart to Hart brings back so many fond memories.  Husband and wife in love, rich,good looking and always get themselves in an out of a jam.  You'll enjoy the first one as much as you will the last one.  They don't make 'em like they used to!!!!!
We liked this Movie very much! So sad about Lionel Stander (Max). Nice to see some of Montreal that we adore!
I ordered this DVD two times and both times it wouldn't play on my TV or computer.  I was very disappointed.
I really enjoyed this movie. It is my fondest wish they would release the rest remainder of the Hart to Hart seasons. The movie has a clear picture and good sound.
I loved "Two Harts in Three-Quarter Time"  In fact I love them all.  I am such a big fan. I can't wait for the last three seasons to be released.
What a great series.  Wish you could bring it back with the same pair at their age now.
The harts are at it again in this murder, mystery movie, Came in on time & plays great.
great,will watch it more than once.
If you loved the series, you will love the TV monnies (there eight of them).
good

The couple of amateur sleuths have aged; but are still out there searching for the truth in order to help friends.  I loved the series and am glad to have seen that the studios produced this along with several other movies involving this glamerous couple

I had not seen this program since it had gone from the air, but I enjoyed re-watching this one very much.  I am gong to order more of these episodes and I know that I will enjoy them all.  The program was very high class, not one with vulgarisims or sexual innuendos. Although they were very loving with their relationship it was not overblown, It is refreshing to once again watch a program that you can share with  your grandchildren.

I always enjoyed the Hart to Hart series. It's fun to watch these now. They are good mysteries, but how many mystery solvers really have millions at their disposal? At least the Harts always cared about each other, treated their help well, and solved the mysteries. The stories are well worth watching.

This show is fairly good as far as the plot and keeping your interest. It definitely would be worth buying and viewing several times. The show was good if you like the actor & actress as well because it was neat to see them again in action. I bought it for that reason and was not disappointed.

Excellent , series I also enjoy Robert Wagner and Stephanie Powers.
I enjoyed the series when it was on ABC.
Yes happy with the videos
Thank You
Love Hart to Hart they are my favorite husband and wife team and I love the chemistry between them!
Just couldn't keep our interest.  Shut it off after about 1/2 an hour.  I think what we expect from a movie has changed to much over the years.  This was probably good back then but not now.
As above
Awesome
Love all the Hart to Hart's...just wish there were more made.
Blank discs.

If you were a fan of the Hart to Hart series, then you'll love this movie.  It's full of the same content as the show - mystery, romance, drama and intertwined with a bit of romantic comedy.  I loved the show as a teenager and still love it as an adult.  I have watched the series and the movies over and over and will continue to do so.
So sad about Max, but all the adventures he left for this show are just like him.. great scene in end, wish there was more of those...
